'Venezuela', countryCode: 've' }, { value: 'Vietnam', countryCode: 'vn' }, { value: 'Wales', countryCode: 'gb wls' }, { value: 'Wallis and Futuna', countryCode: 'wf' }, { value: 'Western Sahara', countryCode: 'eh' }, { value: 'Yemen', countryCode: 'ye' }, { value: 'Zambia', countryCode: 'zm' }, { value: 'Zimbabwe', countryCode: 'zw' }, ]; const DEFAULT_STATE = { lastname: "", firstname: "", interested: "", country: '', gender: "", bio: "", email: "", birthday: "", save: false, complete : 0, loading: false, w_lastname: false, w_firstname: false, w_gender: false, w_interested: false, w_country: false, w_bio: false, }; const ProgressBar = () => ( ); class BasicsInformations extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {...DEFAULT_STATE}; this.countries = countries.map((item, index) => ({key: index, text: item.value, value: item.value })); } componentWillUnmount() { this.setState({save: false, loading: false}) } async componentDidMount() { try { const {data} = await API.getEditProfilValues(); if (data.findProfil) this.setState({...data.findProfil}); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } } handleSave = async(props) => { console.log(1); // Init errors let errors = false; // Check Country const country = this.countries; let find = false; country.map((data) => { if (data.value === this.state.country) find = true; }); if (!find) this.state.w_country = "Please select a valid country" // Check Name and Last Name const regex = new RegExp("[^A-Za-z]"); if (regex.test(this.state.lastname)) this.setState({w_lastname : "Only characters are allowed for your lastname. Must contain between 3 and 13 characters."}); if (regex.test(this.state.firstname)) this.setState({w_firstname: "Only characters are allowed for your first name. Must contain between 3 and 13 characters."}); // Check Gender and Interested by if (this.state.interested !== "male" && this.state.interested !== "female") this.setState({w_interested : "Please select a valid interest option"}); if (this.state.gender !== "male" && this.state.gender !== "female") this.setState({w_gender : "Please select a valid gender option"}); if (this.state.bio && this.state.bio.length > 90) this.setState({w_bio : "Your bio is too long, please use 90 maximum characters. You have " + this.state.bio.length }); // Check if warnings are set if (this.state.w_interested || this.state.w_country || this.state.w_firstname || this.state.w_lastname || this.state.w_bio || this.state.w_gender) errors = true; if(errors === false) { try { const data = await API.updateEditProfilValues(this.state); if (data.save) this.setState({save: true, loading: false}); else throw new Error("Error API"); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } this.props.nextSection(); }; } handleChange = (e, { value, id }) => { // Unset warnings if change this.setState({ [id]: value, ["w_" + id]: ''}); }; render() { const {w_firstname, w_lastname, w_gender, w_interested, w_country, w_bio} = this.state; return (

Complete Basics Informations
0 ? w_lastname : null} fluid label='Last Name' color="white" id="lastname" value={this.state.lastname} onChange={this.handleChange} placeholder="Last Name" /> 0 ? w_firstname : null} fluid label='First Name' id="firstname" value={this.state.firstname} onChange={this.handleChange} placeholder="First Name" /> 0 ? w_gender : null} id="gender" control={Select} value={this.state.gender} options={genderOptions} label="Select Gender" placeholder='Gender' onChange={this.handleChange} /> 0 ? w_interested : null} id="interested" control={Select} value={this.state.interested} options={genderOptions} label="Interested by " placeholder='Interested by' onChange={this.handleChange} /> 0 ? w_country : null} id="country" control={Select} value={this.state.country} options={this.countries} label="Select Country" placeholder='Country' search onChange={this.handleChange} /> 0 ? w_bio : null} label='Bio' control={TextArea} id="bio" placeholder="Bio" value={this.state.bio} onChange={this.handleChange} />
) } } export default BasicsInformations;
